glmcs 0.1.0
  • Reference

glmcs: Generalized Linear Model with Confidence Sets

Source: R/model.R
glmcs.Rd

Fits a sparse likelihood-based additive single-effect (LASER) model using the iteratively blockwise coordinate ascent alogirthm across various generalized linear model families. Supports Gaussian, binomial, Poisson, Gamma GLMs, and Cox regression models.

Usage

glmcs(
  X,
  y,
  L = 10L,
  family = gaussian(),
  coverage = 0.95,
  cor_threshold = 0.5,
  standardize = TRUE,
  null_threshold = 1e-06,
  tol = 0.05,
  ties = c("efron", "breslow"),
  lambda = 0,
  tau = 0.5,
  max_iter = 100L,
  seed = NULL
)

Arguments

X

Numeric matrix or vector of predictors. If a vector, it will be converted to a matrix.

y

Response variable (vector for GLMs, matrix with time and status for Cox regression).

L

Integer specifying the number of components to fit (must be at least 1 and less than ncol(X)).

family

A family object specifying the model type (e.g., gaussian(), binomial(), poisson(), Gamma(), or cox()).

coverage

Numeric in [0,1] specifying the target coverage probability for credible sets (default: 0.95).

cor_threshold

Numeric in [0,1] specifying the minimum absolute correlation for variables within a credible set (default: 0.5).

standardize

Logical indicating whether to standardize predictors (default: TRUE).

null_threshold

Numeric specifying the threshold below which coefficients are set to zero (default: 1e-6).

tol

Numeric specifying convergence tolerance for log-likelihood (default: 5e-2).

ties

String specifying method for handling tied events in Cox regression: "efron" (default) or "breslow".

lambda

Numeric specifying convergence tolerance for log-likelihood (default: 5e-2).

tau

Numeric specifying convergence tolerance for log-likelihood (default: 5e-2).

max_iter

Integer specifying maximum number of fitting iterations (default: 100).

seed

Integer seed for reproducibility (default: NULL).

Value

A list with components:

theta

Matrix of estimated coefficients (p by L)

intercept

Estimated intercept (NULL for Cox regression)

pmp

Matrix of posterior model probabilities (p by L)

dispersion

Estimated dispersion parameter

loglik

Matrix of log-likelihoods (p by L)

cs

Credible sets obtained from posterior probabilities

niter

Number of iterations performed
